attributes.action: Prevent MPs blocking No deal Brexit.
attributes.background: 17.4 million people voted to leave the E.U. when asked stay or  leave. The then Prime minister said it was down to the people not the government or MPs. If MPs are allowed to block a No deal Brexit then this goes against the democratic will of the people and should not be allowed.

rejection.details: How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
